name: Squeue
body:
## Install

``` bash
$ go get github.com/dukex/squeue
```

## USAGE

Creating a queue to run task with 2 seconds interval

``` go
package main

import "github.com/dukex/squeue"
import "fmt"
import "time"

var QUEUE *squeue.Queue

func main() {
  QUEUE = squeue.NewQueue(2 * time.Second)
  QUEUE.Run()

  QUEUE.Push(func() {
    fmt.Println("first!")
  })
  QUEUE.Push(func() {
    fmt.Println("Hi")
  })
  QUEUE.Push(func() {
    fmt.Println("Hello!")
  })

  <-time.After(10 * time.Second)
}
```

Output every 2 second

```
first!
Hi
Hello!
```

## Who use it?

* [Twitter Bot Ideias da Liberdade](https://twitter.com/@ideiasliberdade)
  Using to tweet with 1 minute interval [code](https://github.com/dukex/ideiasliberdade/blob/master/ideiasliberdade.go#L93-L98)
